objetivo.title: ‚ú® Our Goal ‚ú®

text.p1: At Whale Studio, our goal is to revolutionize the way people interact with the spaces they inhabit. We strive to create environments that not only reflect physical beauty but also inspire inner reflection and the expansion of consciousness.
text.p2: Our commitment is to provide innovative solutions that not only decorate but also stimulate the imagination.

objetivo.quote: "In every reflection, a new perspective; in every mirror, a world of possibilities."

secciones.contenido1: By making a reservation at our facilities, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted all the terms and conditions outlined here. If you disagree with any of them, we kindly ask you not to proceed with the reservation.

secciones.contenido2: Upon completing the reservation, we will store your contact details. One day before the scheduled date and time, we will send you a confirmation message. If we do not receive your response up to 2 hours before the scheduled time, we reserve the right to cancel the service and release the room.

contenido3: A tolerance period of 10 minutes is offered after the agreed time for entry. If you do not arrive within that time, the room will be released, and the reservation will be considered lost.
We recommend arriving at least 5 minutes before the scheduled time to receive the keys and the speaker controls for the mirror room.

contenido4: Food and alcohol consumption are not allowed inside the rooms. Any violation of this rule may result in the cancellation of the reservation without a refund.
The tenant is responsible for the proper use of the facilities and must notify any damage or inconvenience during the use of the room.

contenido5: The full payment must be made before entering the room and must be done by the person who made the reservation. Third-party payments will not be accepted.
No refunds will be made for issues not involving the premises or service.

contenido6: It is expected that all tenants and their guests maintain respectful and professional behavior while using the facilities. Additionally, they are responsible for the loss of their personal belongings.
We reserve the right to cancel the reservation without a refund if inappropriate behavior occurs.

secciones.mensajeFinal: ‚ú®Thank you for choosing us! We hope you enjoy your reservation‚ú®
